titles.title: To modify the project for flood control, Wood River, Grand Island, Nebraska.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

term.name: Federal aid to water resources development

bill.summary: 1/19/1999--Introduced. Modifies the project for flood control, Wood River, Grand Island, Nebraska, to authorize the Secretary of the Army to carry out the project at a specified estimated total cost, Federal cost, and non-Federal cost.
